state_analysis: The grid_transform.py file has been successfully created with the initial implementation of the solve function. However, it only sets up the output grid without the proper transformation logic as per the requirements.
explanation: Next, we need to update the solve function in grid_transform.py to correctly implement the transformation from the 2x2 input grid to the 6x6 output grid based on the specified patterns.

commands.keystrokes: cat grid_transform.py | head -n 10; cat temp_transform.py; cat grid_transform.py | tail -n +11 > temp.py; mv temp.py grid_transform.py
